languages.text: Один генерал сказал, что все войны по сути своей одинаковы — если видел одну, считай, видел их все. Брехня — он не был на Ефрате-II.

traits.locale_text: Один генерал сказал, что все войны по сути одинаковые — если ты видел одну, то, считай, видел их все. Брехня. Он не был на Ефрате-II.

languages.text: A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Groxshit. That general didn't witness the events on Eufrates II.
languages.original_text: Один генерал сказал, что все войны по сути своей одинаковы — если видел одну, считай, видел их все. Брехня — он не был на Ефрате-II.

traits.locale_text: A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Grox shit. That general wasn't there on Eufrates II.
A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Grox shit. That general wasn't there on Eufrates II.
A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Grox shit. That general had not witnessed the events on Eufrates II.

A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Grox shit. That general didn't witness the events on Eufrates II.
A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Groxshit. That general didn't witness the events on Eufrates II.

languages.text: 某位将军曾经说过，所有战争的本质都是相同的，只要目睹了一场战争，就相当于目睹了所有的战争。这简直是胡说八道，那个将军肯定没亲眼目睹过欧夫拉茨二号星发生的战争。
languages.original_text: A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Groxshit. That general didn't witness the events on Eufrates II.

traits.locale_text: 某位将军曾经说过，所有战争的本质都是相同的，只要目睹了一场战争，就相当于目睹了所有的战争。这简直是胡说八道，那个将军肯定没亲眼目睹过欧夫拉茨二号星发生的战争。

languages.text: Un général a dit un jour que toutes les guerres se ressemblaient et qu'il suffisait d'en voir une pour les connaître toutes. Balivernes. Clairement, ce général n'a pas assisté aux événements d'Euphrate-II.
languages.original_text: A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Groxshit. That general didn't witness the events on Eufrates II.

traits.locale_text: Un général a dit un jour que toutes les guerres se ressemblaient et qu'il suffisait d'en voir une pour les connaître toutes. Balivernes. Clairement, ce général n'a pas assisté aux événements d'Euphrate-II.

languages.text: ある将軍はかつて、すべての戦争は基本的に同じだと言った――ひとつ目撃すれば、すべての戦争を知ったも同然だと。馬鹿げている。その将軍はユーフラテス・IIでの出来事を目撃していなかったのだから。
languages.original_text: A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Groxshit. That general didn't witness the events on Eufrates II.

traits.locale_text: ある将軍はかつて、すべての戦争は基本的に同じだと言った――ひとつ目撃すれば、すべての戦争を知ったも同然だと。馬鹿げている。その将軍はユーフラテス・IIでの出来事を目撃していなかったのだから。

languages.text: Un general dijo una vez que todas las guerras son esencialmente la misma: vista una, vistas todas. Y una mierda de grox. Ese general no presenció los sucesos de Eufrates II.
languages.original_text: A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Groxshit. That general didn't witness the events on Eufrates II.

traits.locale_text: Un general dijo una vez que todas las guerras son esencialmente la misma: vista una, vistas todas. Y una mierda de grox. Ese general no presenció los sucesos de Eufrates II.

languages.text: Ein General sagte einmal, dass alle Kriege im Grunde gleich sind. Kennt man einen, kennt man alle. Groxscheiße. Dieser General hatte die Ereignisse auf Eufrates II nicht miterlebt.
languages.original_text: A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Groxshit. That general didn't witness the events on Eufrates II.

traits.locale_text: Ein General sagte einmal, dass alle Kriege im Grunde gleich sind. Kennt man einen, kennt man alle. Groxscheiße. Dieser General hatte die Ereignisse auf Eufrates II nicht miterlebt.

languages.text: Bir general zamanında, tüm savaşların özünde aynı olduğunu söylemişti... Ona göre birini gördüysen hepsini görmüştün. Groks boku. Generalin, Eufrates II'deki olaylara tanık olmadığı her hâlinden belli.
languages.original_text: A general once said that all wars are fundamentally the same — if you've seen one, you've seen them all. Groxshit. That general didn't witness the events on Eufrates II.
